column5: Hey guys, I came across this lure on youtube and think it would work on my lake (Kawarthas).  Any thoughts, experiences?  Looks like you can only buy it thru their website. Walleye Guy
Sorta looks like a Nils Master, have an old one with scales.
https://www.tackledirect.com/thundermist-stingnose-jigging-spoons.html That site shows them up to 2 3/4 ounces!
